text: I just heard The Office closed it's doors for good - shocking...
The Office is permanently closed. New business in same location is now V. Picasso, an upscale tapas bar owned by Victor Fuentes, which opened October 6, 2009.

You get a mix of people here. Townies. Professors. Grad students. Undergrads.

The interior is really nice. Wood. Pretty handblown glass lamps. Etc.
You can come in with a big group of people and find a spot to takeover. 
Pool tables. Darts. Foose.
Cute, friendly waitresses.
Good drink specials.
Live music - for free.

Overall low-key and a good time.
Good atmosphere, friendly service and awesome life music. There's karaoke as well. So, you can sing your heart out if you want to.
